Data: 1335hrs Australia have won the toss and will be batting first. As feared, they will miss Peter Siddle who is out with a sore back. Ryan Harris is his replacement. Pakistan have their counter-injury too: Mohammad Aamer is out with the groin injury, but thankfully Mohammad Asif has recovered from hi
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 wide starts off with a big wide down the leg side
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run back of a length, outside off, Watson shoulders arms to it
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run makes him play this time, on target, Watson responds with a back-foot defensive
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run goes for the expansive drive, one bounce to short cover
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run length delivery, around off, presses forward and defends it back to the bowler
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run looks to run this one down to third man, but the ball nips back a touch and cramps him
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run hands on heads all around as Watson gets an inside edge while looking to drive a fullish delivery, will get a single to long leg and keep strike
Umar Gul to Watson, no run squares him straight away, back of a length, and Watson just plays inside the line, and is hit high on the back leg
Umar Gul to Watson, no run length delivery, pushed back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Watson, no run again playing inside the line, gets a leading edge, but safe and along the ground
Umar Gul to Watson, no run this time he gets the inside edge, slightly shorter this one is and he looks to drive and gets the inside edge that travels safely to square leg
Umar Gul to Watson, no run angling into the pads, pushed to square leg
Umar Gul to Watson, no run this one grips from a length and gets him in the glove, good testing start from Gul - a maiden
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run angled across him, he gets across and lets it go
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run fuller delivery, Marsh leans forward and pushes this one to cover
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run short, gives him the room, cuts, but straight to Fawad Alam at point
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run nicely bowled, pitches in front of middle, making him play, and it's just short of a length, and Marsh can't do much with it
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run this is a fuller delivery, guides it to wide of mid-on for a single
Mohammad Asif to Watson, FOUR runs Watson is on his way, this time he gets the length and the width for his favourite horizontal-bat shot, and crashes it past point to the short square boundary
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run short of a length, around off, Marsh shoulders arms, 142ks
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run this is slightly wider and he lets it go without fuss
Umar Gul to Marsh, 2 runs chops this one down to square of third man, and early and clear calling means they are back for the second before Rana Naveed can get the ball back in
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run slightly fuller, and he shoulders arms again
Umar Gul to Marsh, FOUR runs superb drive on the up, puts the front foot down, and meets the length delivery with a slightly open face, in the gap between mid-off and extra cover
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run looks to run this one down to third man, but it's too close to him
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run seam movement, in towards the batsman, can't do much else than playing it back
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run no room here as Watson looks to play it with an open face, good disciplined bowling
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run leans back this time and makes room, and dabs it down to third man
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run plays it with soft hands, picks out Mohammad Yousuf at mid-off, and pinches a single after hitting straight to the captain!
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run pick-up shot from in front of stumps, but Pakistan have the square-leg boundary covered
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, FOUR runs crashed through point, this is not that short, but Marsh goes ahead with the short-arm cut shot, this one doesn't deserve to go four, but goes racing past point
Umar Gul to Watson, FOUR runs creating the pulling length with the short-arm pull, gets under this delivery just back of a length, and pulls it down the ground, and clears the infield with it
Umar Gul to Watson, FOUR runs makes him bowl fuller, is expecting a fuller delivery, and Watson just murders it straight past him, all of Watson power there in this straight hit

Umar Gul to Watson, 2 runs pinches a couple now, gets behind the line and then opens the face, gets it past slip, and they rush back for two before Asif can get around from third man. Soft hands do the trick
Umar Gul to Watson, no run gets a leading edge on the slower delivery while looking to flick it to leg, but he is safe
Umar Gul to Watson, no run good bouncer, 139ks, tails in as he looks to pull, is late on the shot anyway
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run back of a length, cramping him, but he flicks it to left of mid-on and retains the strike
Mohammad Asif to Watson, FOUR runs he has hit this really hard, gets down on a knee, opens up the arc, and off-drives, nay drills, it past mid-off. Not much wrong with the delivery here
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run cuts off the front foot, Alam gets a hand at point and keeps them down to one
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run no slips, and guided away through the region for a single
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run slight seam movement in towards him, hit hard and powerfully towards mid-on, but they come through for one because Yousuf is the fielder, who duly fumbles
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run angled across him, and allowed to go through to the keeper
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run superb delivery, lots of wrist in it, pitches around middle and leg, and seams away, beating Marsh just outside off
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run driven on the up, wide of mid-off, gets a single
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run presses forward and defends it towards cover
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run almost chopped on, looking for that same single to third man, gets a bottom edge that evades the stumps, and Akmal makes a nice diving one-handed save
Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 run same shot, this time he gets it right, and takes a single to third man
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run cut away but straight to third man this time
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run slightly outside off, angling away, and Marsh shoulders arms to it
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run gets the room, leans back, helps it through to third man
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run straight-drive, firm and powerful, but straight back to Asif, on the bounce
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run offcutter, pitches leg, heads towards middle, can't do much with it
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run another offcutter, slightly shorter too, and no room either, defended towards cover
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run gets cutting width with this one, but goes one bounce to Younis at cover-point
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run thick edge to this offcutter, gets a single to third man, good over
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run starts on target, just back of a length, on the stumps, played back to the bowler
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run a touch of width there, but can't get it past cover-point
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run short delivery, worked away to the left of square leg for a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Watson, no run yorker, on the middle stump, can't do anything with this one
Naved-ul-Hasan to Watson, no run shorter, in the channel outside off, played to point
Naved-ul-Hasan to Watson, no run legcutter, looks to work it to leg, and it gets another leading edge from Watson, and it's safe again
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run short of a good length delivery and Marsh taps it away towards square leg

Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run beauty! again short of a length and this one shaped away a touch from the off stump line, Marsh had no option but to play at it and he was beaten all ends up. Well bowled
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run on the middle and off stump line, played straight to the man at cover
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run short of a good length and this one is bit wide outside the off stump, Marsh leaves it through to the keeper
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run pitched up and close to the off stump line, Marsh gets well forward and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off

Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Marsh stays back and taps it into the gap between the cover fielders and they scamper through for a well judged single

Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, FOUR runs take that! good length delivery outside the off stump, nothing wrong but Marsh just steps forward and hits through the line and the ball sails away to the long-off fence. Clean hit

Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, FOUR runs and again! similar length but bit wide outside the off stump and this time Marsh frees his arms and lofts it away to the wide long-off fence. Rana under pressure here
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run pitched up and thats driven straight bat, Rana gets a right-foot across and gets hit on the angle - no damage done though
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run forced away off the back-foot to the point region
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run played off the back-foot to backward point, early call and they scamper through for a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Watson, no run short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended watchfully
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run continues to keep it tight, back of a length, slight offcut away from the body, not much room
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 3 runs gets a touch too full and is flicked away through the gap between mid-on and midwicket, gets a comfortable three
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run offcutter again, Watson is looking at third man again, but it ends up too close to the body, Asif even gets into a stifled shout claiming pad-first
Mohammad Asif to Watson, FOUR runs there's the slog, good and old fashioned, length ball, drags it from outside off and lofts it to cow corner
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 2 runs looks for the yorker, gets too straight, and is whipped away to square leg, they risk Salman Butt's arm and get a two thanks to the wide throw

Mohammad Asif to Watson, OUT this time the offcutter works, Watson premeditates another slog over midwicket, but Asif gets this perfectly right, pitches outside off, cuts back in, beats the waft, and hits the top of off
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run on target, back of a length, pitching within the stumps, ending up just outside off, defended
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run slightly straighter, and worked away for one
Naved-ul-Hasan to Ponting, no run 161 beats per minute as he goes back and across, and behind the line and defends
Naved-ul-Hasan to Ponting, no run and again he gets across and defends to off

Naved-ul-Hasan to Ponting, OUT oh the impulsive pull gets him! sees something slightly short, and goes back and across to pull, but it's not quite short and beats him, and because it is slightly fuller than pulling length, it gives the impression that it stayed low. It might have too, but i
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run shoulders arms to a fullish delivery outside off
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run length ball, presses forward and defends towards mid-off
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run back to bowling offcutters, just back of a length, and not giving him much room
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 2 runs fuller and straighter, and worked away towards square leg, and Saeed Ajmal is slow, thus allowing them a couple
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 2 runs again, full and straight, and he has worked it away past midwicket this time, gets another couple
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, no run driven on the up, straight to mid-off, this time they don't risk it with Yousuf
Mohammad Asif to Marsh, 1 run runs this one past first slip, and gets a single to third man
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run plays with an open face, can't get it past point
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run this time he steers it past point, and gets a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run back of a length, just outside off, defended back to the bowler
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run comes forward, drives, connects well, can't get it past mid-on

Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run stop-start after dropping it at his feet, they come through for the single, and Umar Akmal - running in from short cover - misses the stumps by a long way, Marsh was a goner had he hit
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run and again steers this one down towards third man for one
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run and beats him outside off right away, slight seam movement away from Marsh, enough to beat his attempt at steering it to third man
Umar Gul to Marsh, 2 runs strays on the pads, and worked away to wide of square leg, will get two
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run across him, presses forward, and shoulders arms
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run gets an inside edge onto the pad as he looks to work it off his hips

Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 run pushes it down towards mid-off with soft hands and comes through for one - not without having to avoid a three-way collision: Clarke, marsh and Gul were all too close to each other for their liking
Umar Gul to Clarke, no run looks to drop and run but has hit too powerfully towards midwicket
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run flights this one outside off, driven down to long-off for one
Afridi to Clarke, no run full delivery outside off, and he gets back and across and lets it go through to the keeper
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run shouts of catch it, Clarke jumps out of the crease, the ball drifts and dips, he plays it in front of the body, but wide enough of Afridi
Afridi to Marsh, no run flat and fast and across him, played towards point
Afridi to Marsh, FOUR runs slower, googly, Marsh makes room, reads the googly, and cuts it in front of square, superb placement
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run overpitched on the pads, worked away for one
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run good line and length from Gul, just back of a length and no room to do anything with it
Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 run fuller, square-driven, gets it past point for a single
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run another run-out missed, again hit straight to cover by Clarke, they come through for one, Afridi goes for striker's end, and the throw is just a bit too high
Umar Gul to Marsh, FOUR runs fifty for Marsh, pulls this short delivery, and he gets a top edge fine of fine leg
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run this one he lets go through to Akmal outside off
Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 wide strays too far down the leg side - just the second extra, the first one was the first delivery of the innings
Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 run angling across him and guided towards deep point for a single
Afridi to Marsh, 2 runs wrong'un, and is driven to wide of long-off for two
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run on the pads, driven to long-on for one
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run presses forward, sees a short delivery, goes back, cuts it, gets a single
Afridi to Marsh, no run full, yorks him, hit back to the bowler
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run quicker delivery, chopped away to the right of short third for a single
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run dances down the wicket, flicks it off the pads for a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run length delivery, easily pushed down the ground for one
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, no run that cramping line and length, Marsh defends to the bowler
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, (no ball) over-steps in this delivery, defended to cover
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 2 runs slower ball, mowed to deep midwicket, and they get two for it, hit just to wide of deep midwicket, Saeed Ajmal
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run this time Younis hits the stumps direct, but Marsh has been sent back this time, and he is safely in - horse has bolted and all that. Gets an overthrow to boot
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run slower ball, almost a yorker on the pads, can't do much with it
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run shorter, on the pads, and helped away for one
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run slightly short, Clarke goes back and cuts, gets a single to third man

Ajmal to Marsh, no run beats him with a sharp offbreak, drawing him forward and then breaking away, Akmal sees him drag the back foot out, and whips the bails off, he has made it back by a split frame
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run drops it into the covers and comes through for a quick single
Ajmal to Clarke, no run turned away off the pads, but straight to square leg
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run steps out of the crease, Ajmal shortens the length, hit to midwicket
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run premeditates the sweep, from outside off, gets a single to fine leg
Naved-ul-Hasan to Marsh, 1 run helped away off the pads, gets a single to square leg
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run angling into the pads, can't get it past midwicket
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs slower ball, turns out to be a fulltoss on the pads, Gul fumbles at fine leg, another couple ensues
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs another couple to fine leg, this is worked to the left of Gul, but it's also soft hands that means Gul has to run in too, and he isn't quick enough in doing so
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run this one straightens a touch, and Clarke has to check his attempt at working it away to leg
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run goes back and across, and guides it to the right of point for one
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run Clarke dances down to the pitch of the ball, and drives him down to long-off
Ajmal to Marsh, no run gets an inside edge onto the pads as he looks to turn it to leg
Ajmal to Marsh, no run premeditates another sweep, misses this time
Ajmal to Marsh, no run tossed up wider, driven square, can't beat cover-point
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run goes across this time, and works it from outside off towards square leg
Ajmal to Clarke, no run jumps out of the crease again, gets a leading edge this time, all along the ground towards cover
Afridi to Marsh, no run low fulltoss, hit straight to midwicket
Afridi to Marsh, 2 runs offcutter, an obvious one, helped away to short third, and Gul lets it through his arms, poor fielding
Afridi to Marsh, FOUR runs tries another offcutter, goes horribly wrong, long hop, outside leg, and pulled away easily for four
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run goes for the cut, there is extra bounce, goes uppishly, but past point
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run short and wide, cut away for one
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run regulation legbreak, flighted, on the pads, knocked around for one
Ajmal to Marsh, no run Ajmal draws him wide, flighting it outside off, pushed in front of his body, towards cover
Ajmal to Marsh, no run shapes to sweep, Ajmal bowls it in flat, little cat and mouse going on here
Ajmal to Marsh, no run opens the face this time, but hits straight to short third
Ajmal to Marsh, no run flighted outside off, defended towards point
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run this time he connects with the sweep, all along the ground, gets off strike
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run topspinner, Clarke goes back and cuts it for one
Afridi to Clarke, no run nicely bowled, a quick leg break, around off, defended to cover
Afridi to Clarke, 2 runs quicker one, going with the arm, gets the inside half of the bat, fine of fine leg
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track, bunts it to wide of midwicket
Afridi to Marsh, no run flighted on the pads, hit straight towards midwicket
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run pushed to cover and before Fawad turns and throws they have made it for an easy single
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track and drives down the ground for one
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run again he uses his feet to get to the pitch of it, and drives it to long-on
Ajmal to Marsh, no run looks to sweep, again, flatter delivery comes out, he misses, but has got his pad outside the line
Ajmal to Marsh, no run shapes to sweep, Ajmal goes wide, he aborts the shot, opens the face, but can't get it past short third
Ajmal to Marsh, no run cover-drive, Younis makes a nice diving save at extra cover
Ajmal to Marsh, no run shorter, opens the face, straight to Afridi at cover-point
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run sweeps from outside off, all along the ground again, and gets a single
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run he follows the Clarke method this time, coming out of the crease and driving it down the ground
Afridi to Clarke, no run shorter and flatter, 101ks, Clarke goes for the cut, but it's not that short, and is beaten
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run steps out and gets a single to long-on again
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run stays back and pushes this shortish delivery to long-on
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run again Clarke steps out, this one goes straight with the arm, but he still gets a single off the inside half of the bat
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run fulltoss on the pads, worked away for a single
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run flat delivery, worked away from outside off to a vacant midwicket for one
Ajmal to Clarke, no run this time the offbreak beats him, but Clarke's pads are covering it in case he steps out and misses
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run draws him wide this time, Clarke pushes at away from his body, gets an inside edge, and still gets a single
Ajmal to Marsh, 2 runs steps out, gets to the pitch of it, wristily flicks it to wide of long-on, and they take a couple to Gul
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run bunted away towards midwicket for a single
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run doosra, almost beats a stepping-out Clarke, but he manages an outside edge and a single to a fumbling Asif at short third
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run nothing can keep him in the crease, though, he dances down again, and gets a single to long-on
Afridi to Marsh, no run offbreak, clear change of grip, pitches leg, beats him outside off
Afridi to Marsh, no run another offbreak, this time he cuts, but can't get it past backward point
Afridi to Marsh, 1 run this time it's cut to the left of point, gets a single
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run regulation legbreak, goes back and punches it past cover
Afridi to Marsh, no run offbreak, outside leg, turning towards the stumps, Marsh misses out on an easy single
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run and he steps down the track again and gets a single to long-on
Ajmal to Marsh, 1 run looks for the cut, the ball follows him, but he manages to open the face and get a single to point
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run sharp offbreak, worked away off the pads, gets a single to midwicket
Ajmal to Marsh, no run looks for the extra-cover drive, the ball goes straight through and cramps the shot
Ajmal to Marsh, no run quicker delivery, just outside off, defended to cover

Ajmal to Marsh, OUT superb bowling, follows that quicker delivery with a nicely flighted, inviting offbreak outside off, Marsh is drawn out of the crease, as if pulled by a string, and then the ball bounces away from his reach and spins away, beating him, and Taufel doesn't even need to go
Afridi to Clarke, no run flat and fast, into the pads, Clarke misses out
Afridi to Clarke, no run quick footwork again, but can't get it wide enough of Afridi
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run bunts this one to left of cover for one
Afridi to White, no run nice legbreak on target, White comes forward and defends
Afridi to White, no run again a nice flighted legbreak outside off, 88ks, defended to cover
Afridi to White, no run this is flatter and quicker, 98ks, but just as accurate and is defended
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run Clarke comes down the track again, and gets a single to fine leg as this is fired down the pads
Ajmal to White, no run flat offbreak, 94ks, worked to square leg
Ajmal to White, 1 run this one jumps at him, the toppie, but he gets a single off the glove

Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run dropped, Ajmal has bowled beautifully again, Clarke is stepping out, but he makes him play away from the body, Yousuf at short cover dives, gets a hand to it , but can't hold on to it
Ajmal to White, no run flat and straight, defended
Ajmal to White, no run big, premeditated sweep, misses but gets his front pad outside off
Afridi to Clarke, no run short and flat,. late-cut, can't get it past short third
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run gets a single down the ground this time
Afridi to White, 1 run presses forward and pushed down the ground for one, one would expect the mid-off up
Afridi to Clarke, no run driven to cover, can't find the gap
Afridi to Clarke, no run googly this time, beats him, but is going down the leg side
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run and he comes down the track, and works it away for his 29th single out of a score of 35
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run starts with a length ball outside off, punched away for one
Mohammad Asif to White, no run looks to drive on the up, the ball stops on him a touch, goes uppishly down the ground, this time, though, mid-off is up to stop the single
Mohammad Asif to White, 1 run punched away to sweeper-cover, gets a single
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run back of a length, pushed down the ground, gets a single to long-on
Mohammad Asif to White, 1 run drops it towards cover with soft hands, and calls early, and gets a single
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run back of a length, angling towards the pads, and worked away for one
Afridi to Clarke, no run flat outside off, cuts, can't beat cover-point
Afridi to Clarke, no run presses forward again, but Afridi slips in the quicker one, catches him on the crease, big shout for lbw, but Taufel reckons it's going down with the angle
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run cut to short third, gets a dicey single, Rana fumbles
Afridi to White, FOUR runs what a shot, casually done, makes room, gets under the legbreak and goes inside-out, clean over extra cover
Afridi to White, no run appeal for catch down the leg side, no signal from the umpire, must have clicked the thigh pad
Afridi to White, 1 run short and wide and cut away for one
Mohammad Asif to White, FOUR runs front-foot pull, looks to push him back in the crease, but it's not sharp enough, and he pulls it wide of midwicket
Mohammad Asif to White, no run shoulders arms outside off
Mohammad Asif to White, 1 run offcutter, comes forward and works it wide of midwicket for one
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run drives away from the body gets an inside edge onto the pads, wants a single but is sent back, Afridi from covers throws wildly, it goes over the middle of the pitch
Mohammad Asif to White, 1 run another inside edge, for White this time, it rolls off towards square leg and he gets another single
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run another offcutter, on the pads, worked away for single to midwicket
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run short, outside off, pushed away to sweeper-cover
Afridi to White, 1 run short again, cut away powerfully, gets a single
Afridi to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke dances down the wicket, bunts this one towards square, knows he has hit it softly and comes back for two
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track again, pushes this one down to long-on
Afridi to White, FOUR runs googly, quicker bowl too, deflected off the pads, nice shot, fine leg is too square
Afridi to White, 1 run shorter, outside off, pushed down the ground, walks down for a single, Afridi's 10 overs done for 55 runs
Ajmal to White, no run nice quick offbreak, no room, pushed back to the bowler
Ajmal to White, 1 run this one turns into the pads, hit down the ground for one
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run Clarke dances right down to the pitch of this one, and takes a single to long-on
Ajmal to White, 1 run doosra, goes back in the crease, and cuts it to deep point
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 leg bye beautifully bowled again, big turn, flat delivery too, beats the poke, but he gets a leg-bye
Ajmal to White, 2 runs short outside off, cut away towards sweeper-cover
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs walks down the track, Rana bowls short, and he plays it with soft hands towards third man and gets a couple
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run slower ball, he is early into the shot, has to check, can't beat the straightish midwicket
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run driven powerfully, but straight to cover
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run another good-looking drive on the up, another dot ball, because he can't get it past point
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 3 runs slower offcutter, worked away off the pads, past short fine, runs three, runs all the way to a hard-earned fifty - no boundaries in it
Naved-ul-Hasan to White, 1 run another run-out missed, bunted straight to point and runs through, Younis would have got White had it hit down the stumps at the non-striker's end, but misses
Ajmal to White, no run quick offbreak on the pads, hit straight to midwicket
Ajmal to White, 1 run slog-swept, slog-swept hard, one bounce to deep midwicket
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run runs this one down to third man, hands over the strike to White
Ajmal to White, 1 run doosra, leading edge, lobs wide of him, the single brings up Australia's 200
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run another doosra, another leading edge, but this is all along the ground, to long-off
Ajmal to White, no run shorter, spinning in, punched through covers
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run again Clarke drives Rana straight to cover
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs walks down the ground, pushes it past the outstretched arm of Rana, and calls early for two because he hasn't hit it too hard, and he comes back for two
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run steers it down to third man for a single

Naved-ul-Hasan to White, OUT lovely legcutter, yanks the wrist at the point of delivery, pitches off, back of a length, moves away a touch, squares him up, takes the outside edge, and White has to go - this should delay the Powerplay further
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, no run full delivery, driven straight down to mid-off
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, no run looks for the dab to third man, can't beat point
Umar Gul to Clarke, FOUR runs driven on the up, Clarke's first boundary, thanks to a misfield by Butt at cover, lets it go under his knees
Umar Gul to Clarke, FOUR runs walks across and flicks it over short fine, superb shot, superb awareness of the field setting
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run bunted to cover for a single, and rightly Butt has been removed from there, and Umar Akmal brought in
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run back of a length, dropped towards point, and comes through for one, quick, decisive running
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run walks down the pitch, drives down the ground, gets a single to long-on
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run short and wide, cut away to sweeper-cover for a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run pushed to the left of midwicket, gets a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 2 runs low fultoss, gets it straighter of long-off and takes two
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 1 wide good yorker, just down the leg side, and moving away after pitching, Akmal does well to prevent any more extras
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, FOUR runs good shot, gooood shot, shimmies down the track, check-drives this length delivery past extra cover
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, no run gets the yorker right this time, hit back to the bowler
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 3 runs just short of being a yorker, and he plays the short-arm flick square on the on side, Butt runs hard and knocks it back into field of play, saves one run
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run slower short delivery, swiped towards midwicket, will get a single
Umar Gul to Clarke, FOUR runs makes room, follows him, turns out to be a leg-side half-volley, and is worked away without fuss, square leg can't do much about it
Umar Gul to Clarke, (no ball) 2 runs good bouncer, gets the top edge, but it's a no-ball, and Clarke pushes for two: he wants the free hit
Umar Gul to Clarke, (no ball) high fulltoss, wide of off, called no-ball for height, swings and misses, gets a bye as it bounces in front of Akmal

Umar Gul to Hussey, (no ball) 2 runs interesting, Taufel from square leg calls a no-ball, not enough men in the circle? swipes, gets it past short fine, and gets two, comedy of errors for Pakistan. Free-hit continues - there were four men outside the circle. It's all happening!
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run good yorker, will get just a single to deep square leg
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run drags it from outside off, bat turns it in his hand, gets a single to midwicket
Umar Gul to Hussey, SIX runs nice juicy fulltoss, and bang it's in the crowd behind the midwicket fence
Umar Gul to Hussey, 2 runs slower ball, he gets under it, over midwicket, Umar Akmal does well, running around from long-on and keeping them to two
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run length ball, driven inside-out, but doesn't get it wide enough of long-off, and retains strike
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 2 runs slower ball, swept square of deep square leg, gets a couple
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, FOUR runs fulltoss, sliced away off the face of the bat, through cover, mis-hit, but the fulltoss deserves to go for four
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 1 run fuller, this time they have a sweeper-cover back, will get only a single
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run well bowled, full and wide of off, away from Clarke's reach
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run good yorker, just outside off, played with an open face, gets a single to point
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 2 runs a near-yorker, driven to wide of long-off, gets a couple
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run yorker, just a single to point, can he bowl five more of those?
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run well bowled, slower delivery, yet a yorker, beats him outside off
Umar Gul to Hussey, OUT Hussey misses 50, looks to walk down the pitch to alter the length, gets too much under a low fulltoss, and they have protection down at long-off where Younis makes no mistake

Umar Gul to Clarke, OUT he is on a hat-trick, would you believe it? Last over he bowled three back-to-back no-balls, and here he has both the settled batsmen in two deliveries. Clarke walks across, looking to hit it over leg, gets an inside edge on a near-yorker, is castled
Umar Gul to Hauritz, 1 bye good wide yorker, Hauritz misses, Haddins is backing up a long way, and comes through for a bye. Akmal hits the stumps direct, but Haddin has beaten him by a split frame
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run Haddin looks for a scoop over fine leg, Gul is fast and wide of off, and Haddin just makes a limp connection and gets a single

So in an innings where for the first 45 overs no team had the clear upper hand - Australia never ran away nor got bogged down - Pakistan wilted in the last five overs, the batting Powerplay. As a result, they are chasing an imposing 287. Join us for the chase, in about half an hour.
We are back with Pakistan's reply. They need 287 to keep the series alive. Two slips in for Doug Bollinger. Salman Butt to face
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run starts off with a full delivery, on the pads, driven down to mid-on
Bollinger to Salman Butt, FOUR runs low fulltoss on the pads, Butt accepts the gift, clips it to the square-leg boundary
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run angling into the pads, no swing, flicked away, can't get it past the square leg in the circle
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run gets it closer to off stump this time, defended with a straight bat
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run this one kicks off a length, 140ks, beats Butt who is almost drawn onto the front foot, and goes chest high to Haddin
Bollinger to Salman Butt, FOUR runs full and wide, gives Butt space to swing his arms, and out comes a gorgeous cover-drive that finds the gap
Harris to Kamran, 1 run back of a length, into the pads, worked to wide of mid-on
Harris to Salman Butt, FOUR runs and a nice nice shot here, the punch-drive from Butt, angled across him and hit on the up, wide of mid-off
Harris to Salman Butt, no run angled across him again, this time he shoulders arms
Harris to Salman Butt, no run shorter this time, closer to off stump, presses forward and defends
Harris to Salman Butt, 1 run another punch-drive, inside-out, past short cover, gets a single because White dives and slows it down

Harris to Kamran, OUT given! Akmal moves across to work it to the leg, misses it completely, Harris goes for the shout right away. Asoka de Silva upholds it. Replays show the ball kissing the top of off, and possibly hitting him outside the line. There were two sounds, but definitely no insi
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run on target, no room, not straight enough to work it to leg
Bollinger to Salman Butt, 1 run steers this one down to third man for a single
Bollinger to Younis, no run short ball, angled across him, defended solidly
Bollinger to Younis, no run goes back and across and defends to cover
Bollinger to Younis, no run plays away from the body this time, gets an inside edge onto the pads
Bollinger to Younis, no run leaves this one alone outside off
Harris to Salman Butt, no run driven firmly, towards mid-off
Harris to Salman Butt, 1 run hit on the up again, gets it past short cover, not much power in it, but will get a single
Harris to Younis, no run looks to drop and run, but Clarke at cover is alert
Harris to Younis, no run back of a length, on off, no room, defended to cover
Harris to Younis, no run again stays around off, just short of good length, defended towards cover
Harris to Younis, no run slightly fuller, Younis comes forward, and defends towards point
Bollinger to Salman Butt, 3 runs hurried into the pull shot, but gets enough bat on it, Hauritz at mid-on gets a hand to it while diving, and saves one run for the team
Bollinger to Younis, no run driven away from the body, hit two bounce to cover
Bollinger to Younis, no run still not off the mark, goes back and across and punches it towards cover
Bollinger to Younis, no run bouncer now, too short, Younis has enough time to duck under it
Bollinger to Younis, no run another solid drive straight to hand, a fumble at short cover but Butt sends him back - rightly
Harris to Salman Butt, no run punched down the ground, straight to mid-off
Harris to Salman Butt, 1 run slashes outside off, gets a single to third man
Harris to Younis, no run length ball, around off, driven down to mid-off, still not off the mark
Harris to Younis, no run slightly slower, presses forward and defends outside off
Harris to Younis, no run defends right under his head, not taking Harris on
Harris to Younis, no run drives in front of his body, connects nicely, but straight on the bounce to short cover
Watson to Salman Butt, no run squares him up, lbw appeal right away, pitched outside leg
Watson to Salman Butt, no run squares him up again, although it's going straight with the angle, thick outside edge towards point
Watson to Salman Butt, no run back of a length, angled across, hit on the bounce to short cover
Watson to Salman Butt, no run short of good length, just around off, gets close to the stumps, not much of an angle, defended back to the bowler
Watson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs nice shot, gets a touch of width, and eased away through point, cut shot without power, just guides it
Watson to Salman Butt, 2 runs too straight, helped away past square leg, again just looks for the placement rather than power
Harris to Younis, no run length ball, around off, Younis gets on the front foot, and pushes it down to mid-off
Harris to Younis, no run shorter, gets it to rise high, and defended again
Harris to Younis, 1 run finally off the mark, driven with an open face, Ponting dives at backward point, gets a hand on it, keeps them down to one
Harris to Salman Butt, no run surprise bouncer, Butt ducks under it
Harris to Salman Butt, no run angled across him, defended towards point
Harris to Salman Butt, FOUR runs shot! flick-pull, short into the body, the pace is not disconcerting, and Butt stands tall and dismisses it
Watson to Younis, FOUR runs this one goes through the field, superb timing, just a push outside off, off the back foot, beats short cover and it flies across the outfield
Watson to Younis, no run similar shot, but this time he finds Hussey at short cover
Watson to Younis, no run slower ball, is early into his attempted dab to third man
Watson to Younis, no run drives a length ball, straight down to mid-off
Watson to Younis, no run slower ball, pushed one bounce to Hussey at short cover
Watson to Younis, FOUR runs short and wide, and Younis gets on top of it and cuts it between Ponting and Clarke at backward point and cover-point respectively. Watson is left admonishing himself
Harris to Salman Butt, no run back of a length, not much room, defended off the back foot
Harris to Salman Butt, 2 runs on the pads, worked away to wide of deep square leg, gets a couple
Harris to Salman Butt, no run length ball around off, defended
Harris to Salman Butt, no run just short of a length, around middle and off, defended towards cover
Harris to Salman Butt, no run fuller, presses forward and defends it towards mid-off
Harris to Salman Butt, 1 run gets a hint of room here, and runs this down to third man
Watson to Salman Butt, no run length ball, around middle, worked towards midwicket
Watson to Salman Butt, 1 run slower ball, drops it towards cover and runs through for a well-judged single
Watson to Younis, 1 run dabs this one down to third man
Watson to Salman Butt, no run angled across him, shapes to drive, but changes his mind, and lets Haddin earn his living
Watson to Salman Butt, 1 run runs this one down to third man, from in front of off stump
Watson to Younis, 2 runs driven on the up, uppish, but wide enough of White at cover, Hussey from sweeper-cover makes a diving save, and they take only two
McKay to Salman Butt, no run starts with a length delivery, around off, Butt gets an inside edge towards mid-on
McKay to Salman Butt, no run on target again, pushed down to mid-off

McKay to Salman Butt, OUT Asoka has struck again, no movement, going with angle, headed towards middle stump, and it had to be pitched outside leg. Asoka de Silva doesn't think so, and raises his finger. It's pitched way outside leg. What's more? It's going over the stumps. Salman Butt is f
McKay to Mohammad Yousuf, no run defended off the back foot, towards leg
McKay to Mohammad Yousuf, FOUR runs and going with those shiny pads, Yousuf starts off with a sparkling lofted shot, steps down the wicket and smashes it back over McKay's head
McKay to Mohammad Yousuf, 3 runs straying down the pads, and helped away fine. Fine leg is too square, and they come back for three
Watson to Mohammad Yousuf, no run looks to come forward, Watson bowls short, keeps him on the crease as he defends

Watson to Mohammad Yousuf, FOUR runs superb touch cricket, slower ball, into the pads, and glanced away fine, no chance for the fielder. Forget Yousuf's fielding and captaincy, when he bats he is something else
Watson to Mohammad Yousuf, no run looks for the dab to third man, gets an inside edge onto the pad
Watson to Mohammad Yousuf, no run again he looks for third man, again he gets an inside edge onto the pads
Watson to Umar Akmal, 2 runs gets a thick edge to one that stays low a touch, goes fine of third man, gets a couple
McKay to Younis, no run looks to force this one through cover, doesn't get close to it, the inside half of the bat takes it to mid-on
McKay to Younis, no run back of a length, outside off, played towards point

McKay to Younis, OUT that's a beast of a delivery to get on a slow pitch, digs it in short, Younis thinks he is safely swaying away, but it chases him all the way back, and kisses the bat on the way. Haddin takes a nice overhead catch, one-handed, full stretch, lovely to watch
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run starts off with the shuffle, defends just outside off
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run fuller delivery, outside off, played towards point
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run length delivery, around off, defended back to the bowler
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run angled across Umar, shoulders arms
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, 2 runs moves across, and works him to wide of square leg for two
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run fuller delivery, driven down to mid-off
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, 1 wide bouncer, too high, easily ducks under it
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run aggressive delivery, 143ks, back of a length, rising towards the chest, defended well
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run stays back of a length, defended off the back foot
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, 1 run runs this one down to third man and keeps the strike
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run goes for the bouncer, angled down the leg side, was good when it passed the stumps
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run stays on the crease, and defends a length ball
McKay to Umar Akmal, 2 runs good running, guides it to slightly fine of third man, and comes back for two
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run opens the face again, but hits it straight to third man this time
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run just outside off, defended to cover
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run back of a length, around off, defended back to the bowler
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run full delivery, square-driven, straight to cover-point
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run nearly played on, looks to defend outside off, the inside edge goes wide of leg stump
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run beauty! 144ks, back of a length, seaming away, Umar is tentative, misses the edge not by much
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run looks to open the face on a full delivery, can't get it past point
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, no run back of a length again, hops and defends
Bollinger to Umar Akmal, 1 run soft hands, plays towards point, and retains the strike
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs turn there but Umar nudges it late, past short third
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run turning into the pads, helped around the corner for one
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run comes forward, opens the face, plays towards point
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, 1 run angled into the pads, and played for an easy single to get off the mark
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run looks to turn it to leg, it's the toppie, gets the leading edge, but it's safe
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run this is too short, and worked away for an easy single to square leg
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run starts back of a length, defended towards midwicket
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run looks to guide it to third man, doesn't get close to the line, and is also beaten by the pace
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run takes a quick single to cover, drop-and-run really
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run pitched outside leg, angling away, defended towards cover
McKay to Fawad Alam, 1 run another drop and run, towards mid-off this time
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run short delivery, gets big on him, fended from in front of his face, keeps it down, though, and gets a single too
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs another nice nudge past short third man, almost out of Haddin's gloves, too wide and short
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs gets forward, to the pitch of it, with soft hands he works it to square leg, calls early, and runs fast to get two
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run slightly shorter, not too short, defended to midwicket
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run looks to drop and run to cover, but Haddin is out of the blocks in a jiffy
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run spinning into the pads and worked around the corner for one
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run leading edge as he looks to turn it to leg, all along the ground, though
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run angling towards the off stump, looks for a single to point, but has hit too powerfully
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run chops it down to third man, wants two but it has gone straight to Watson
McKay to Fawad Alam, 1 run shuffles all the way across, finds it is on the pads, and gets a single to square leg
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run slower ball, 124 ks, and Umar is beaten while trying to run it down to third man. There is a little noise as it passes the bat, no appeal, though
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 wide digs this one in short, down the leg side
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run dabs it towards cover-point and comes through for one
McKay to Fawad Alam, 2 runs edged, and just past the diving Haddin, flirting with one that is far from him, and Harris - big unit that he is - makes a superb diving save at the third man boundary
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs short, cut away past backward point
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run presses forward, guides it past point and takes a single
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, 2 runs top-edges a sweep, from way outside off, lands safe
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run turn, angled in, pitches, moves away, defended towards point
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run flighted around off, defended towards point
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run getting consistent turn now, defended off the back foot
McKay to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs nice shot, angling into the pads, a touch too far down, and he smartly deflects it fine of fine leg
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run is drawn into a loose shot now, wide, there for being cut, but the feet don't move, and is beaten
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run back of a length, just outside off, defended towards cover
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run leaves this one alone outside off
McKay to Umar Akmal, no run fishes outside the line of off, no feet again, and is lucky not to have edged it
McKay to Umar Akmal, 1 run gets back and across this time and cuts it to sweeper-cover
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run the overspinner, hurries on to Umar, defended to leg
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs paddles from outside off, and hares between the wickets to come back for two
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run another overspinner, defended back to the bowler
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run arm ball this time, just straying down the pads
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run sharp turn from outside off, Umar tries to cut, but it is not that short
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run flighted outside off, Umar presses forward and defends
Watson to Fawad Alam, no run defended off the front foot, towards cover
Watson to Fawad Alam, 2 runs nicely placed, punched off the back foot, between cover and extra cover, gets two
Watson to Fawad Alam, no run fuller, on the stumps, gets him in a semi-tangle because of the shuffle, worked to midwicket eventually
Watson to Fawad Alam, no run cut powerfully, one bounce to cover-point
Watson to Fawad Alam, no run offcutter, angling towards off, Alam wants one to cover-point, Akmal sends him back
Watson to Fawad Alam, no run shoulders arms to this one
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run topspinner, played towards short fine
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs turn and bounce, but he gets on top of the bounce and cuts it along the ground
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run sweeps, sweeps well, but finds White at square leg
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, no run short, looks to turn it around the corner, can't beat backward square leg
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run pulls, it's not that short, hence it goes in front of square
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run full, driven to short cover
Watson to Umar Akmal, 1 leg bye short, into the pads, misses, the ball rolls along off the pad, and Alam calls him through for a single
Watson to Fawad Alam, 2 runs driven on the up, Clarke dives at extra cover and gets a hand onto it, saving two runs
Watson to Fawad Alam, 1 run short, punched away, Marsh at cover fumbles
Watson to Umar Akmal, no run comes forward and defends towards cover
Watson to Umar Akmal, 1 run looks to press forward and is bounced, somehow he gets the bat in the way and manages to keep the pull shot down
Watson to Fawad Alam, 1 run punched to the right of Bollinger at mid-off and they come through for a single
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, 1 run driven off the back foot, gets a single to sweeper-cover
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs superb slog sweep, flat delivery, full, in his arc, and he connects well, and clears midwicket with ease
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs having shortened his length, he cuts him this time, slightly late, so that he goes square of sweeper-cover, and takes two
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs reverse-sweep this time, from outside off, and gets it past short third
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run gets a stride in, and drops and runs for a single
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run misjudges the length, pushes forward, and then goes back to defend
Watson to Umar Akmal, 1 run moves across the stumps, and works it to deep square leg for a single
Watson to Fawad Alam, FOUR runs pulled away off the front foot, powerful slap of a shot, over midwicket
Watson to Fawad Alam, 1 run another drop and run, they don't look like subcontinental batsmen - they have run as well as, say, Dhoni and Raina when batting together
Watson to Umar Akmal, 1 run flicked in the air, doesn't get enough power, and good for him, because it almost carries to Marsh at deep square leg
Watson to Fawad Alam, 1 wide angled a long way across him, called a wide
Watson to Fawad Alam, no run presses forward, defends it back to the bowler
Watson to Fawad Alam, 1 run pierces the cover ring with a punch, but there is sweeper-cover in place
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run slow, teasing him, Alam shuffles, then makes room, and goes for the pull, and still is early into the shot, the ball bounces just over the off stump
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, 1 run Ponting dives full length at cover, they still come through for one
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs worked away from in front of the stumps, and they hare up and down and get a couple
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 2 runs fifty for Umar, what a busy little hustle this has been, gets there with a late cut past backward point, does the sajda, well done Umar
Hauritz to Umar Akmal, 1 run full delivery, driven down the ground, gets a single
Hauritz to Fawad Alam, no run beats Fawad with the sharp offbreak, angled into him, then turning away
Harris to Umar Akmal, no run Umar goes for the pull, mistimes it, and it bounces short of Watson at mid-on
Harris to Umar Akmal, FOUR runs this is better, he gets across, and wafts it, nay belts it, all along the carpet, but through the leg-side field, mid-off already back to long-on
Harris to Umar Akmal, no run looks to turn it down to leg, but it is a touch too sharp and hits him in the thigh
Harris to Umar Akmal, 1 run fuller outside off, opens the face, gets a single to third man
Harris to Fawad Alam, 1 run gets an inside edge while driving, goes to the left hand of Clarke at midwicket, hits the stumps direct but Alam is in
Harris to Umar Akmal, 1 run makes room, runs this down to third man, gets a single
Clarke to Umar Akmal, no run cut from in front of stumps, can't get it past point
Clarke to Umar Akmal, no run looks to cut a half-volley, and is duly beaten
Clarke to Umar Akmal, no run looks to cut again, not that short, gets the top edge, one bounce to Watson at short third
Clarke to Umar Akmal, no run he is hell bent at cutting, again from in front of middle and leg, too full too, doesn't get anything
Clarke to Umar Akmal, 1 run flighted on the pads, worked away for a single to square leg
Clarke to Fawad Alam, 1 run and he drops and runs, it's not even gone off the square but they come through conmfortably
Harris to Fawad Alam, 1 run cut away, gets a single to deep point
Harris to Afridi, no run back of a length, defends it to point
Harris to Afridi, 1 leg bye seams in again, gets a leg-bye
Harris to Fawad Alam, 1 run presses forward, takes a single to point
Harris to Afridi, no run big back lift, Harris is accurate, Afridi defends it back
Clarke to Fawad Alam, 1 run short, punched away to sweeper-cover
Clarke to Afridi, 1 run not looking for the six here, paddles it smartly for a single
Clarke to Fawad Alam, no run punched away, can't get it past Ponting at short cover
Clarke to Fawad Alam, no run drives this one straight to point
Clarke to Fawad Alam, 2 runs paddles this one away, and takes a couple
Clarke to Fawad Alam, no run flat, on the pads, hit straight to midwicket
McKay to Afridi, 3 runs Afridi goes, goes over mid-off, gets three, smart shot, not looking for too much power, just clears the infield
McKay to Fawad Alam, 1 run full, on the pads, flicked away, gets a single
McKay to Afridi, no run goes for the big hit outside off, doesn't beat extra cover
McKay to Afridi, 1 run slower ball, goes cross-batted, gets just over midwicket, wide long-on cuts it off
McKay to Fawad Alam, 1 run takes a sharp single, just to the right of cover
McKay to Afridi, 1 run slower ball, runs it down to third man, takes a single
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run pulls him right away, flat and aerial, one bounce to deep square leg
Bollinger to Fawad Alam, 1 run White fumbles at cover, Alam is alert, and they come through for the single
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run back of a length, angled across him, cuts it to third man for a single
Bollinger to Fawad Alam, no run full ball, driven, this time White is alert at cover
Bollinger to Fawad Alam, 1 run slower ball, guides it past point for a single
Bollinger to Afridi, FOUR runs pulls off the front foot, gets the top half of the bat, but finds the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket
McKay to Fawad Alam, no run full ball, hit straight to Clarke at midwicket
McKay to Fawad Alam, 1 run dragged from outside off, gets a single down to long-on
McKay to Afridi, 1 run full and fast, driven to sweeper-cover for a single

McKay to Fawad Alam, OUT and finally his shuffle is breached, the shuffle always leaves him exposed to a sharp incoming delivery, and perhaps for the first time tonight, Australia bowl one such delivery to Fawad, and the inside edge cannons into the middle stump
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run is late into the pull shot, almost an afterthought, is beaten by a long way
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run fuller delivery, driven with an open face, gets a single
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run full and straight, played towards point
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run slashes outside off, misses
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run bunts it to cover and takes a single
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run moves across, back of a length delivery, drops it at his feet and runs through
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run pulls all over a short delivery, lucky to survive
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run makes room and runs it down to third man for a single
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, FOUR runs cut away wide of third man, this shot would have done Watson proud
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run this cut goes straight to third man - right so Watson to Afridi, Air Time?
Watson to Afridi, no run wide delivery outside off, looks to open the face, misses
Watson to Afridi, no run slower ball, driven to extra cover
Watson to Afridi, 1 run drives a length ball down the ground for a single
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run back of a length, they pinch a single off the inside edge
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run short delivery, helped away past point, hands over the strike to Afridi
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run makes room, Bollinger fires a nice yorker, outside off, gets some bat to it, and takes a single to backward point
Bollinger to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run short delivery again, runs it down to third man
Bollinger to Afridi, 2 runs slower ball, 126ks, and he has drilled it through White at midwicket, pulled away so powerfully that the fielder doesn't want to get in line
Bollinger to Afridi, no run fulltoss outside off, slashes inside the line
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run full and straight, driven down to long-of for one
Watson to Afridi, FOUR runs starts with a slower ball, Afridi backs away, and powers it over point, good start for Pakistan
Watson to Afridi, 1 run back of a length this time, quick too, pushed down the ground for one
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 2 runs Rana steps down, lofts this length delivery straight, gets a couple before long-on can come around
Watson to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run runs this one down to short third and takes a single
Watson to Afridi, FOUR runs moves around in the crease, first across, then away, Watson bowls short, and he has punched away absolutely sweetly, all along the ground, through point

Watson to Afridi, SIX runs Watson comes, Watson goes, backs away, gets a length delivery, gets under it, inside-out, over extra cover, straight into the debris where reconstruction is going on - 18 off the over
Harris to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run drilled towards extra cover, Ponting gets a bad bounce, Rana doesn't come through for one
Harris to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run full and straight, hit back at Harris, who stretches out his left hand and keeps it to dot
Harris to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run steps out of the crease, and gets a single to long-on
Harris to Afridi, 1 run yorker, well bowled, Afridi can get just a single
Harris to Naved-ul-Hasan, FOUR runs what a shot, stands his ground, gets a length ball outside , and smack he goes over extra cover. Game on here
McKay to Afridi, no run low fulltoss, hit hard, straight to mid-off
McKay to Afridi, 1 run full and straight, Afridi makes room and swings, gets a thick edge to third man for a single
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run good slower ball, Rana almost plays two shots to it, and misses, 106ks, he is a very good operator with that slower ball
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, 2 leg byes makes room, McKay follows him with a sharp delivery, Rana comes back for two leg-byes to third man
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, SIX runs ho ho ho Rana has well and truly joined the party, clears the front leg, gets a length delivery, gets under it, swings clean as a whistle, and clears cow corner
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, 2 leg byes slower ball, beats him, goes off the thigh, bounces in front of Haddin, the deflection of the keeper beats short fine leg, and they hustle back for two
Harris to Afridi, FOUR runs whoa! Afridi moves all the way across, takes a low fulltoss, and gets into an awkward position, and gets it past short fine leg
Harris to Umar Gul, no run sharp bouncer, Gul has no clue about it
Harris to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run Rana swipes, can't get it past midwicket
Harris to Naved-ul-Hasan, FOUR runs lovely shot, makes room, not much room with this full delivery, but squeezes it through the covers, all along the ground
McKay to Ajmal, no run short ball, tucks him up, can't get it off the square
McKay to Ajmal, FOUR runs just meets that ball with an open face, gets it off the middle of the bat, beats cover, and gets four, just like that

McKay to Ajmal, 1 run double miss here! It's actually funny! short ball, hit straight to White at midwicket, White goes for the underarm flick, misses, Ponting - backing up - still has Ajmal short, but misses from a metre. White sees the funny side of things, but he is covering his face whi
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run slower ball, gives it his all, the top edge lands short of third man
McKay to Ajmal, 1 leg bye lbw appeal, but headed down the leg side, will get a leg-bye
McKay to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run turns a shortish delivery around the corner, keeps the strike
Harris to Mohammad Asif, no run gets behind this full delivery and defends
Harris to Mohammad Asif, no run short ball, fends, misses
Harris to Mohammad Asif, 1 run full on the pads, worked away for a single
Harris to Ajmal, 4 leg byes angled down the pads, and he gets four leg-byes
Harris to Ajmal, 1 run worked away off the pads for a single. Well bowled Ryan Harris, coming in for Peter Siddle who tormented Pakistan two days ago, and taking a five-for
Bollinger to Ajmal, no run angled across Ajmal, who shoulders arms
Bollinger to Ajmal, no run yorker outside off, Ajmal misses
Bollinger to Ajmal, 1 run runs it down to third man for a single
Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, no run fulltoss, hit down the ground to mid-off
Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, no run backs away, almost plays this one on
Bollinger to Mohammad Asif, no run gets right behind the line and defends
Hauritz to Ajmal, 1 run slog-sweeps, one bounce to deep midwicket
Hauritz to Mohammad Asif, no run flatter delivery, stops and turns, defended to leg
Hauritz to Mohammad Asif, no run looks to slog, misses

Well played and congratulations to Australia for another comfortable win - on Australia Day. Well Pakistan will know that when it comes to pure talent, they were not far off. Australia were just led by a better captain, were much more alert with the running between the wickets and in the field, an
Australia won by 40 runs
Player of the match is Ryan Harris, AUS
